title: Southeast Asia grows wary of crypto miners
description: As illegal crypto mining and scam compounds proliferate across Southeast Asia, governments are discovering that "cheap" power for bitcoin can mean billion-dollar losses, strained grids and rising climate costs.

title: 3 Reasons Why Bitcoin Looks Like a Buy After Its Recent 25% Dip
description: As the world’s largest cryptocurrency, Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) matters a great deal to investors looking to amplify their upside in a market that’s been pretty consistently driven by risk assets during this bull market rally we’ve benefited from.  And despite some in the crypto sector who may be holding onto the long-told thesis that Bitcoin resembles “digital gold” ... 3 Reasons Why Bitcoin Looks Like a Buy After Its Recent 25% DipThe post 3 Reasons Why Bitcoin Looks Like a Buy After Its Recent 25% Dip appeared first on 24/7 Wall St..
